data.system_settings: LG X Power running Android Marshmallow 6.0.1
data.actual_result: It asks to save changes even though you changed nothing
data.expected_result: It backs out of the channel without asking to save any changes (since you didn't change anything in the first place)
data.short_description: Discord asks you to save changes when there aren't any changes at all
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a channel in a server with around 45 characters in its name - Go to Channel Settings for that Channel - Back out of channel settings (make sure you made no changes before backing out) - It asks you to save changes or discard.
